EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Oct08 User Provisioning Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp user provisioning webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp user provisioning webinar. Date: Friday, October 31 Time: 12 pm (Eastern) / 9 am (Pacific)
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=user&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: user
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: 888-810-4937 (give operator the passcode: "USER" and conference leader's name: "Neal Vora")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
If you would like to receive Halloween candy for the event, please email Lea.Simon@intapp.com with your mailing address by October 24th.
http://www.intapp.com All information Copyright 2008 IntApp, Inc. All rights reserved.
